scripts.build: rimraf dist && babel src --out-dir dist/js && copyfiles etc/** dist
scripts.damage: node --version && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NAME=damage DEBUG=api:* PORT=8090 REST_PATH=src/rest nodemon src/index.js --exec babel-node
scripts.impact: node --version && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NAME=impact DEBUG=api:* PORT=8088 REST_PATH=src/rest nodemon src/index.js --exec babel-node
scripts.facet: node --version && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NAME=facet DEBUG=api:* PORT=8086 REST_PATH=src/rest nodemon src/index.js --exec babel-node
scripts.test: cross-env DEBUG=api:*,test:* NAME=damage NODE_ENV=test PORT=9019 REST_PATH=src/rest mocha --recursive --require babel-register --exit "test/**/*.js"
